recent_events: Wanderer unexpectedly encountered Wise-Llama, who responded with delight, prompting a friendly exchange of greetings.
human_current: Oh hello llama, I didnt expect to see you today, what an unexpected pleasure!
scenario_history: Recently, Wanderer and Wise-Llama noticed each other during their roleplay journey. This marked a new phase in the scenario where they both acknowledged and interacted with one another, setting the stage for future events and conversations within the narrative.
ai_npc_current: "Indeed, it is a delightful surprise, my friend How has your journey been"
